headline: UBS Raises PT on Constellation Brands, Inc. (STZ) Following Q1 2025 Earnings Release
summary: Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ), with its low price-to-earnings multiple and significant presence in Warren Buffett’s investment portfolio, secures a spot on our list of the 12 Cheap Value Stocks to Buy Now According to Warren Buffett. Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) reported Q1 2025 earnings on July 1, 2025. The company missed Wall Street’s expectation of […]

headline: Craft Spirits Market Forecast Report 2025-2030: Craft Spirits Market to Surge with 9.55% Growth, Driven by Premiumization and Cocktail Culture
summary: The Global Craft Spirits Market is projected to rise from USD 32.919 billion in 2025 to USD 51.931 billion in 2030, at a CAGR of 9.55%. Driven by premiumization, cocktail culture, and rising disposable incomes, the market faces regulatory, cost, and competition challenges. Key growth is seen in North America, fueled by consumer demand for unique, sustainable products. Key players include Diageo, Pernod Ricard, and Constellation Brands.Dublin, Aug. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Craft Spirits
